section.p: This section describes how you can check whether billing runs have failed, re-invoke payment processes, or explicitly start a billing run. In addition, you can preview customer billing data for a specific period or export revenue share data to an XML file.
section.note: Billing runs and payment processes apply to the native billing system of . They do not take into account any costs and data in external billing systems integrated with . These are controlled and managed solely in the external billing system.
section.p: Use the reporting facilities to retrieve detailed information on all billing-relevant data of the suppliers, resellers, brokers, and marketplace owners managed on your platform. For details, refer to .
The definition of revenue shares is described in detail in .
